checkmate_patterns.name: Back Rank Mate
checkmate_patterns.description: A situation where the opponent's king is trapped on the back rank and is checkmated by a rook or queen.
checkmate_patterns.moves: Rook moves to the back rank, delivering check while the opposing king is unable to escape.

checkmate_patterns.name: Smothered Mate
checkmate_patterns.description: A checkmate where the king is surrounded by its own pieces, and a knight delivers the check.
checkmate_patterns.moves: Knight moves to deliver check, and the opponent’s king is unable to escape because it’s surrounded by its own pieces.

endgame_scenarios.name: King and Pawn vs. King
endgame_scenarios.description: An endgame where a single pawn tries to promote while the opponent's king tries to stop it.
endgame_scenarios.moves: The pawn advances while the king supports it. The opponent's king attempts to block the pawn’s progress.

endgame_scenarios.name: King and Rook vs. King
endgame_scenarios.description: A situation where one player has a rook and the other only a king. The goal is to checkmate.
endgame_scenarios.moves: The rook controls an entire rank or file, cutting off the opponent's king from escaping while the own king helps in cornering the enemy king.
